titles.title: Country of Origin Labeling Act of 2007
A bill to amend the Agricultural Marketing Act of 1946 to require the implementation of country of origin labeling requirements by September 30, 2007.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1239)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary:
1/26/2007--Introduced.
Country of Origin Labeling Act of 2007 - Amends the Agricultural Marketing Act of 1946 to change the country of origin labeling implementation date from September 30, 2008, to September 30, 2007.
